titleStmt.title: Some quæries to be answered in writing or print, by the masters, heads, fellows, and tutors of the collegde [sic] they are setting up at Durham. And by Thomas Weld, Rich: Prideaux, Sam: Hammond, Wil: Cole, and Wil: Durant, priests of Newcastle. / From them that are in scorne called Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Weld, Thomas, 1590?-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library, London, England.
